definition: emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to act impetuously (idiom); on an impulse

sentences.english: It is imbroglio of feeling's kind And enmity holding up his feet.
sentences.chinese: 是感情的恩恩怨怨的纠葛绊住了脚。

sentences.english: You hurt my feelings by betraying me when I'm in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 你太伤我感情了，居然在我身陷困境之时背叛了我。

sentences.english: He disguised these feelings under an enormous bellowing and hurraying.
sentences.chinese: 他用大声吼叫和喝采掩饰着这些感情。

sentences.english: Can the technetium view of the outside let E people emotional desalt Ma?
sentences.chinese: 外界的锝说法会让莪们的感情淡化唛？

sentences.english: Weddings and funerals are the emotional events.
sentences.chinese: 婚事和丧事都是动感情的时候。

sentences.english: I must ask you to still visit with me. My feelings inside do not change.
sentences.chinese: 我求你一定要经常看望我，我内心的感情没有变。

sentences.english: However, this does not prevent us from the start of their feelings of confidence.
sentences.chinese: 可是，这并不妨碍我们对彼此感情地久天长的信心。

sentences.english: A section of defeat's sentiment most abstains from is, never forgets.
sentences.chinese: 壹段失败的感情最忌讳的便是，念念不忘。

sentences.english: And Pierre began to have the same feeling towards Karataev.
sentences.chinese: 皮埃尔也开始对卡拉塔耶夫抱着同样的感情。

sentences.english: So we, with an attitude of pursuing true emotion, seek for love.
sentences.chinese: 于是我们抱着追求真感情的态度，寻找爱情。

sentences.english: Never talk about feeling if they aren't there.
sentences.chinese: 如果你没有真情实意，就不要谈论什么感情。

sentences.english: Astute salesmen know how to invest emotionally.
sentences.chinese: 精明的商人懂得如何感情投资。

sentences.english: How’s his love life at the moment?
sentences.chinese: 他现在的感情生活如何？

sentences.english: The Buddha reaches us that we should turn our emotions into our wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 佛法教给我们，要把感情转变成智慧。

sentences.english: Send to the small gift to express affection, promote the comity .
sentences.chinese: 送小礼品以表达感情，增进友谊。

sentences.english: Yet after all this drama, I still can't shake the feelings out of my system.
sentences.chinese: 然而，毕竟这戏，我仍然不能摆脱感情出我的系统。

definition: (romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
to be in contact (with sb)/to associate/to interact/to get along (well, poorly)
affection/family love/love, esp. within a married couple or between parents and children
